actions.text: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 29).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hill.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 29).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 29).

description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 117-3 to change Title II funding partnership requirements to the extent practical to partner with an industry or with a labor or joint labor management organization.
purpose: Amendment sought to require partnerships eligible for funding under Title II to partner with a labor or joint labor-management organization only to the extent practicable.
